title: SCTIMST Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for Apprentice Posts
description: The Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute of Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.Sc., DMLT can apply for the SCTIMST Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limi...
